items.title: 关于iPhone Air你可能错过的5个小细节，包括只有一个扬声器 (原标题: Here Are 5 Smaller iPhone Air Details You Might Have Missed, Including Only a Single Speaker)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# iPhone Air你可能错过的5个小细节

Apple全新超薄iPhone Air已于周五发布，关于这款设备，有一些你可能错过的细节。

![iPhone Air Hands On Thumb 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/O0UqSrkm2Ty3PyRdyv-Ra-L4Nqo=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iPhone-Air-Hands-On-Thumb-2.jpg?lossy)

以下是关于iPhone Air你需要了解的五个关键信息：

1.  **单一扬声器配置**
    *   iPhone Air仅配备一个扬声器。设备顶部的听筒兼作扬声器，但底部没有扬声器。USB-C端口左右两侧的孔洞是用于麦克风的。
    *   若需立体声效果，建议使用AirPods或支持的外部扬声器。

2.  **灵动岛位置下移**
    *   与iPhone 17和iPhone 17 Pro型号相比，iPhone Air的灵动岛在屏幕上的位置略低。
    *   这可能是由于设备超薄的机身设计，需要进行内部结构调整所致。

3.  **USB传输速度限制**
    *   iPhone 17 Pro型号支持USB 3.2 Gen 2，数据传输速度高达10 Gbps。
    *   而iPhone Air则受限于USB 2.0速度，最高仅为480 Mbps。

4.  **充电速度差异**
    *   iPhone Air可在约30分钟内充电至50%，而iPhone 17 Pro型号则可在约20分钟内达到50%电量。
    *   要实现这些速度，需要更高功率的充电器和数据线。
    *   此外，iPhone Air的MagSafe无线充电功率最高为20W，低于iPhone 17 Pro型号的25W。

5.  **GPU核心数减少**
    *   iPhone 17 Pro型号中的A19 Pro芯片配备6核GPU。
    *   iPhone Air中的A19 Pro芯片则为5核GPU，这意味着其图形性能将略有下降。
items.shortSummary: Apple全新超薄iPhone Air已发布，其设计和性能上有一些关键差异。它仅配备一个扬声器，灵动岛位置略低。数据传输速度受限于USB 2.0（480 Mbps），充电至50%需约30分钟，MagSafe无线充电最高20W。此外，iPhone Air的A19 Pro芯片配备5核GPU，图形性能略低于iPhone 17 Pro的6核GPU。
items.translated_title: 关于iPhone Air你可能错过的5个小细节，包括只有一个扬声器
items.content:
Apple's all-new, ultra-thin iPhone Air launches on Friday, and there are some smaller details about the device that you might have missed.


Below, we outline five things to know about the iPhone Air:

  • As rumored, the iPhone Air only has a single speaker. The earpiece at the top of the device doubles as a speaker, but there is no speaker on the bottom of the device. The holes to the left and right of the USB-C port are for microphones. For stereo audio, use AirPods or a capable external speaker.

  • On the iPhone Air, the Dynamic Island is positioned slightly lower on the screen compared to the iPhone 17 and iPhone 17 Pro models. This was likely necessary due to the device's ultra-thin frame necessitating internal design changes.

  • While the iPhone 17 Pro models support USB 3.2 Gen 2, for data transfer speeds of up to 10 Gbps, the iPhone Air is limited to USB 2 speeds of up to 480 Mbps.

  • Apple says the iPhone Air can be charged to 50% in approximately 30 minutes, whereas the iPhone 17 Pro models can be charged to 50% in approximately 20 minutes. A higher-wattage charger and cable is required to achieve these speeds. In addition, MagSafe wireless charging on the iPhone Air is limited to up to 20W, compared to 25W for the iPhone 17 Pro models.

  • In the iPhone 17 Pro models, the A19 Pro chip has a 6-core GPU. In the iPhone Air, it has a 5-core GPU, so graphics performance will take a slight hit.
Be sure to watch our iPhone Air hands-on video from earlier this week.

items.title: 新款iPhone 18和iPhone 18 Pro传闻：更小的灵动岛，无屏下Face ID (原标题: New iPhone 18 and iPhone 18 Pro Rumors: Smaller Dynamic Island, No Under-Screen Face ID)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## iPhone 18系列传闻概述

根据微博账号“Instant Digital”的最新消息，苹果下一代iPhone 18、iPhone 18 Pro和iPhone 18 Pro Max机型将带来一些设计上的变化，但某些备受期待的功能可能仍需等待。

### 主要传闻

*   **更小的灵动岛（Dynamic Island）**
    *   传闻指出，iPhone 18系列将配备一个略微缩小的灵动岛。此前iPhone 17 Pro机型曾有关于灵动岛尺寸缩小的传闻，但并未实现。此次传闻再次浮出水面，并且有较高可能性成为现实，被视为迈向未来20周年全玻璃iPhone的重要一步。

*   **无屏下Face ID和可见前置摄像头**
    *   尽管屏下Face ID功能已在iPhone 16 Pro、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 18 Pro机型上多次传闻，但根据Instant Digital的最新信息，iPhone 18系列将不会搭载屏下Face ID，也不会配备屏下前置摄像头。
    *   这意味着iPhone 18系列仍将保留可见的前置摄像头，而屏下Face ID可能要等到iPhone 19 Pro或更晚的机型才会首次亮相。

### 消息来源可信度

*   **Instant Digital**：该微博账号拥有约150万粉丝，是一个受欢迎的中文社交媒体平台。
*   **过往准确爆料**：该账号此前曾准确泄露过未来苹果产品的信息，例如iPhone 17 Pro的均热板散热系统、iPhone 14和iPhone 14 Plus的黄色配色，以及Apple Watch Ultra 2的钛金属米兰尼斯表带。
*   **并非完美记录**：然而，该账号并非每次爆料都准确无误，其近期分享的一些关于iPhone 17的传闻并未实现。

### 展望

距离iPhone 18系列的发布还有大约一年的时间，预计未来将会有更多关于这些设备的传闻出现。

![iphone 17 lineup](https://images.macrumors.com/t/j_i49rBoFKOeP6slJZDf13dBsj4=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-17-lineup.jpg?lossy)

items.translated_title: 新款iPhone 18和iPhone 18 Pro传闻：更小的灵动岛，无屏下Face ID
items.content:
Apple's next-generation iPhone 18, iPhone 18 Pro, and iPhone 18 Pro Max models will be equipped with a slightly smaller Dynamic Island, but the devices will not feature under-screen Face ID, according to the Weibo account Instant Digital.


There were conflicting rumors about whether the iPhone 17 Pro models would have a smaller Dynamic Island, but its size did not change. Now, the rumor is back on the table for the iPhone 18 series, and there is a decent chance it will be true this time around, as it would be a stepping stone towards the rumored 20th-anniversary all-glass iPhone.

Under-screen Face ID has been rumored for the iPhone 16 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 18 Pro models, so it feels like one of those features that is always a year or two away. Indeed, if the latest information shared by Instant Digital is accurate, under-screen Face ID will not debut until the iPhone 19 Pro models or later. The cycle repeats.

None of the iPhone 18 models will feature an under-screen front camera, the account added. Instead, the devices will have a smaller Dynamic Island and a visible front camera, according to the information they shared on Weibo today.

Instant Digital has around 1.5 million followers on Weibo, a popular Chinese social media platform. The account has accurately leaked information about future Apple products in the past, such as the iPhone 17 Pro models featuring a vapor chamber cooling system, the Yellow finish for the iPhone 14 and iPhone 14 Plus, and the Apple Watch Ultra 2's Titanium Milanese Loop. However, the account does not have a perfect track record, and some of the other iPhone 17 rumors it shared in recent months did not materialize.

We are still a year away from the iPhone 18 series, so buckle up, as there will be plenty more rumors about the devices to come.

items.title: iPhone Air 和 iPhone 17 Pro 现面临发货时间延长 (原标题: iPhone Air and iPhone 17 Pro Now Facing Extended Delivery Estimates)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# iPhone Air 和 iPhone 17 Pro 现面临发货时间延长

## 预订与发货延迟概况

*   **预订启动：** iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro、iPhone 17 Pro Max 和 iPhone Air 已于周五（2025年9月12日）在美国及其他多个国家开放预订。
*   **最初延迟：** iPhone 17 Pro Max 的发货预估迅速超出原定的9月19日上市日。
*   **普遍延迟：** 截至太平洋时间今天上午11:30后不久，Apple 美国在线商店中，部分 iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro 和 iPhone Air 配置也面临额外的1-3周发货延迟，预计送达时间推迟至9月下旬至10月中旬。
*   **例外情况：** 撰写本文时，部分配置仍可在上市日当天通过特定 Apple Store 门店进行送达或店内取货。

## 热门配置与需求

*   **颜色偏好：** 如果发货预估延长与强劲需求相关，那么 Pro 机型的“宇宙橙”（Cosmic Orange）和 iPhone Air 的“云白”（Cloud White）是目前特别受欢迎的颜色选项。
*   **iPhone 17 需求：** 普通 iPhone 17 的“鼠尾草色”（Sage）和“黑色”（Black）需求旺盛。

## 早期预订者福利

*   对于在周五尽早预订的顾客来说，有一些好消息：部分最初收到9月25日送达预估的订单，现在已提前至9月19日。

## 视觉参考

*   **iPhone Air 所有颜色：**
    ![iPhone Air 所有颜色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/KrrfNIKHfA9SjDEZqGpD_HwFBbY=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iphone-air-all-colors.jpg?lossy)

## 购买决策辅助

*   文章推荐了“购买指南：iPhone 17、Air、Pro 或 Pro Max？40 项差异对比”，以帮助潜在买家做出预订决策。
items.shortSummary: iPhone 17系列（包括iPhone 17、17 Pro、17 Pro Max和iPhone Air）预订开启后，除部分早期订单外，大多数机型的发货预估已延长1-3周，推迟至9月下旬至10月中旬。这表明市场需求强劲，特别是Pro机型的“宇宙橙”和iPhone Air的“云白”等颜色备受欢迎。部分早期预订者的发货日期已提前。
items.translated_title: iPhone Air 和 iPhone 17 Pro 现面临发货时间延长
items.content:
iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and iPhone Air pre-orders began on Friday in the U.S. and many other countries. iPhone 17 Pro Max delivery estimates quickly slipped beyond the Friday, September 19 launch day for those who had yet to place an order, and now the rest of the new models have started to follow suit.


As of shortly after 11:30 a.m. Pacific Time today, select iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone Air configurations on Apple's online store in the U.S. are facing an additional 1-3 week shipping delay beyond launch day, with delivery estimates pushing into late September to mid-October. However, for some configurations, delivery or in-store pickup at select Apple Store locations on launch day is still an option at the time of writing.

We do not know how much supply Apple has for each new iPhone configuration, but if extended delivery estimates generally align with strong demand, then Cosmic Orange for the Pro models and Cloud White for the iPhone Air are proving to be especially popular color options so far. For the regular iPhone 17, Sage and Black are in demand.

On a related note, there is some good news for customers who placed a pre-order as soon as possible on Friday, as some customers who initially received a September 25 delivery estimate have now seen their orders bumped up to September 19.

Need help with making your pre-order decision? Check out our helpful buyer's guide below:

items.title: 致苹果公司 (原标题: 'Dear Apple')
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 致苹果公司：Apple Watch的生命救援故事与最新产品动态

本文综合了苹果公司近期发布会及相关新闻，主要聚焦于Apple Watch的生命救援能力，并概述了iPhone 17系列、AirPods等产品的最新动态和重要信息。

## Apple Watch的生命救援潜力

苹果公司在近期活动中发布了一段名为“致苹果公司”的感人视频。
![致苹果公司介绍](https://images.macrumors.com/t/s5wb3aK6vBgraQzYwawJUvhVVrg=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/Dear-Apple-Intro.jpg?lossy)
该视频展示了真实用户通过Apple Watch获得健康警报、使用紧急呼叫（Emergency SOS）和车祸检测（Crash Detection）功能在关键时刻获救的经历。这些故事涵盖了纽约的健身历程、英国青少年心理健康困境，以及来自美国、日本和加拿大的健康与安全案例，凸显了Apple Watch改变甚至挽救生命的能力。

## 热门新闻概览

### AirPods实时翻译功能受限欧盟用户
*   **问题**：AirPods的新实时翻译功能将不对欧盟用户开放。
*   **原因**：严格的欧盟法规可能阻碍了该功能的推出。
*   **限制条件**：如果用户身处欧盟且其Apple账户区域也在欧盟，则无法使用此功能。

### iPhone 17系列在部分国家和地区仅支持eSIM
*   **趋势**：苹果继续逐步淘汰实体SIM卡槽。
*   **受影响型号**：iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max。
*   **eSIM-Only国家/地区**：巴林、加拿大、关岛、日本、科威特、墨西哥、阿曼、卡塔尔、沙特阿拉伯、阿拉伯联合酋长国等。

### iPhone 17系列预购及等待时间
*   **预购开始**：iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro、iPhone 17 Pro Max和iPhone Air于9月12日太平洋时间上午5点开始预购。
*   **等待时间**：预购开始后不久，许多配置（特别是iPhone 17 Pro Max）已面临较长的等待时间。

### iPhone 17系列发布日期与预购详情
*   **发布会**：苹果于9月9日举行年度iPhone发布会，推出了iPhone 17、超薄iPhone Air、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone 17 Pro Max。
*   **预购时间**：所有新款iPhone型号于9月12日太平洋时间上午5点/东部时间上午8点在美国及数十个其他国家开始预购。
*   **发售日期**：设备的发售日期为预购开始后一周。

### iPhone 18 Pro的早期传闻
*   **主要传闻**：iPhone 18 Pro和iPhone 18 Pro Max可能配备屏下Face ID技术。
*   **信息来源**：显示行业分析师Ross Young在2023年4月分享。

### iPhone 17系列N1芯片的Wi-Fi 7限制
*   **搭载芯片**：iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro、iPhone 17 Pro Max和iPhone Air配备全新的N1芯片，支持Wi-Fi 7、蓝牙6和Thread连接。
*   **Wi-Fi 7限制**：根据MacRumors审查的FCC文件，N1芯片的Wi-Fi 7信道带宽最高支持160 MHz，未能达到Wi-Fi 7的全部潜力。

### iPhone 17 Pro和Pro Max的新设计与特性
*   **设计**：采用全新铝制一体式机身设计。
*   **屏幕保护**：正面采用第二代超瓷晶面板（Ceramic Shield 2），抗刮擦能力提升3倍。
*   **背面保护**：背面也采用超瓷晶面板，抗裂能力比前代玻璃提升4倍。
*   **电池**：配备更大容量电池。

### iPhone 17 Pro系列摄像头新设计
*   **设计变化**：iPhone 17 Pro和Pro Max背面采用“摄像头平台”设计，取代了传统的摄像头凸起，几乎覆盖整个背面。
*   **摄像头系统**：升级后的摄像头系统包括改进的长焦镜头。
*   **像素**：所有三颗摄像头均为4800万像素。
*   **变焦**：提供五种变焦选项。

items.title: 苹果新款N1芯片在iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone Air中存在Wi-Fi 7限制 (原标题: Apple's New N1 Chip in iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone Air Has a Wi-Fi 7 Limitation)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# 苹果N1芯片的Wi-Fi 7限制

苹果最新发布的iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro、iPhone 17 Pro Max以及iPhone Air型号均配备了全新的N1芯片，该芯片支持Wi-Fi 7、蓝牙6和Thread连接功能。然而，根据MacRumors查阅的FCC文件显示，这款N1芯片在Wi-Fi 7带宽方面存在一项限制。

## Wi-Fi 7带宽限制

*   **限制详情**：N1芯片在所有新款iPhone型号中，对Wi-Fi 7的支持最高仅限于160 MHz的信道带宽。
*   **标准对比**：这低于Wi-Fi 7标准所允许的320 MHz最大带宽。
*   **理论速度影响**：这意味着这些设备无法达到Wi-Fi 7理论上的峰值速度。
*   **实际影响**：尽管如此，文章指出，在实际使用中，性能瓶颈通常由互联网服务提供商和其他因素造成，因此对于绝大多数用户而言，这一限制并非一个实际问题。
*   **用户关注**：尽管影响有限，但部分iPhone用户仍希望了解N1芯片是支持160 MHz还是320 MHz带宽，MacRumors通过FCC文件找到了答案。

## Wi-Fi 7技术概述

Wi-Fi 7本身仍然是一项非常快速的技术。它允许兼容路由器在2.4GHz、5GHz和/或6GHz频段上同时传输数据，从而实现更快的速度、更低的延迟和更可靠的连接。

## 与前代产品的对比

*   **iPhone 16系列**：除了iPhone 16e之外，所有iPhone 16型号也支持Wi-Fi 7，且同样限于160 MHz信道带宽。
*   **芯片差异**：iPhone 16系列使用的是博通（Broadcom）芯片进行无线网络连接，这曾让一些用户期待苹果自研的N1芯片能将Wi-Fi 7的带宽限制提升至320 MHz，但事实并非如此。

## N1芯片的其他优势

尽管Wi-Fi 7带宽存在限制，苹果表示N1芯片仍带来了其他显著优势：

*   **性能提升**：改进了个人热点（Personal Hotspot）和隔空投送（AirDrop）等功能的整体性能和可靠性。
*   **能效优化**：有助于提升最新iPhone型号的电源效率。

## 相关图片

*   苹果N1芯片示意图：
    ![apple n1 chip](https://images.macrumors.com/t/0EySOQWSGb1dDH5IWsR8eyphvVA=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/apple-n1-chip.jpg?lossy)
*   FCC文件显示的iPhone 17 Pro Max Wi-Fi规格：
    ![160 MHz](https://images.macrumors.com/t/jzveGM03lqQbBTxnZaC2oyXPjP8=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/160-MHz.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果新款iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone Air搭载的N1芯片支持Wi-Fi 7，但其信道带宽被限制在160 MHz，低于Wi-Fi 7标准的最大320 MHz。尽管这限制了理论峰值速度，但文章指出，由于实际性能常受限于网络服务商，这对大多数用户影响不大。N1芯片还提升了个人热点、隔空投送等功能的性能和可靠性，并有助于提高设备的电源效率。
items.translated_title: 苹果新款N1芯片在iPhone 17、iPhone 17 Pro和iPhone Air中存在Wi-Fi 7限制
items.content:
The latest iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and iPhone Air models are equipped with Apple's all-new N1 chip for Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6, and Thread connectivity. However, the chip has a Wi-Fi 7 bandwidth limitation.


According to FCC documents reviewed by MacRumors, the N1 chip in all of the new iPhone models supports up to 160 MHz channel bandwidth for Wi-Fi 7, short of the standard's 320 MHz maximum. This limitation means the devices cannot achieve the peak theoretical speeds possible with Wi-Fi 7, but real-world performance is typically already bottlenecked by internet service providers and other factors.

For the vast majority of customers, this is a non-issue, but some iPhone users had wanted to know if the N1 chip offered 160 MHz or 320 MHz channel bandwidth for Wi-Fi 7, so we combed through FCC documents to find the answer.

FCC document showing Wi-Fi specs for iPhone 17 Pro Max

Wi-Fi 7 is still very fast. The standard allows for data transmission over the 2.4GHz, 5GHz, and/or 6GHz bands simultaneously, with a compatible router, resulting in faster speeds, lower latency, and more reliable connectivity.

All of the iPhone 16 models — excluding the iPhone 16e — also support Wi-Fi 7 with up to 160 MHz channel bandwidth. Those devices are equipped with a Broadcom chip for wireless networking, though, leading to hopes that Apple's N1 chip might raise the limit to 320 MHz. Evidently, that is not the case.

There are other benefits, though. Apple said the N1 chip improves the overall performance and reliability of features like Personal Hotspot and AirDrop, and it also contributes to power efficiency improvements in the latest iPhone models.

items.translated_title: 据报道，普通版iPhone 17很受欢迎——原因如下
items.content:
The entry-level iPhone 17 model looks very similar to the equivalent iPhone 16 model, but it is reportedly proving popular in at least one country so far.


On the popular Chinese shopping website JD.com, the standard iPhone 17 with 256GB of storage received the most pre-orders of any of the new iPhone models after pre-orders began on Friday, according to the South China Morning Post.

There is one caveat: Apple delayed pre-orders for the all-new, ultra-thin iPhone Air in China due to eSIM regulatory approval issues in the country. However, on Apple's online store in the U.S., most iPhone Air configurations are still available for September 19 launch day delivery, so it is quite possible that the entry-level iPhone 17 would have proved popular in China even if the iPhone Air had also been available to pre-order.

Why is the regular iPhone 17 proving popular, despite being the "boring" choice? It almost certainly comes down to the device's perceived value, as the device starts at the same $799/5,999 yuan price as the regular iPhone 16 did when it launched, despite featuring a larger 6.3-inch display with thinner bezels, ProMotion support for up to a 120Hz refresh rate, a doubled 256GB of base storage, and many other upgrades. The display improvements in particular finally bring the base iPhone more in line with the Pro models.

So while the iPhone 17 does not have a flashy new design, nor is it the thinnest iPhone ever, it appears to be an unassuming hit so far.
